page.name: Page
page.hint: The hotbar page that will be used for the token hotbar. Changing this won't move existing Token Hotbars!

linkToActor.name: Link to linked actor
linkToActor.hint: Link the token hotbar to the actor if the token is linked.

alwaysLinkToActor.name: Always link to actor
alwaysLinkToActor.hint: Link the token hotbar to the actor even if the token is unlinked.

shareHotbar.name: Shared Token Hotbar
shareHotbar.hint: Every token will have a single hotbar shared between players.

lockHotbar.name: Lock shared hotbar
lockHotbar.hint: When set, only a GM can update the token hotbar. Only applies to shared hotbars.

useCustomHotbar.name: Use Custom Hotbar (beta)
